Porsche 911 GT1

This topic covers the Porsche 911 GT1 racing models for 1996-1998

This model has been represented in Forza as the

1998 Porsche #26 Porsche AG 911 GT1-98 (FM1-FM6)

1998 Porsche #5 Zakspeed Racing 911 GT1-98 (FM3)

POLL

Note - voting on polls does not substitute for voting on the topic. Make sure to VOTE above the first post to have your interest in this model counted.

Which model do you prefer?

911 GT1 (1996)

911 GT1 Evo (1997)

911 GT1-98 (1998)

0 voters

My favorit ist the 993 Headlight based car, having a model of it here.

But also would love to see the comback of the 1998 one. Been ages I drove that car in NFS Porsche.

And yes I would want them in Horizon for curzing around.
